cols.h5EnDetail:
One. Product desciption

1. This product is a Disney Plus member account. Exclusive account, one person and one number, sold and deleted.

2. Account server: international version (United States, Canada, South America, Europe, Singapore, etc.)

Two. Directions for use

1. Disney official website: https://www.disney.com/

2. Watching videos has high network requirements, please make sure whether your network supports it, please see [Network Description] for details.

Three. Network Description

Disney+ is not directly accessible in mainland China, so you need to use magic tools from the United States, Singapore, Hong Kong, or other European and American countries such as the United Kingdom, Germany, France, etc. Of course, not all of the above countries can be used, because Disney+ has strict IP requirements, and you can test whether you can open and log in to Disney+ one by one.

Four. Precautions

1. After payment, you can view the purchased account information on the page where the purchase is completed, or you can click the order center in the upper right corner to view and withdraw, and the goods will be automatically shipped within 24 hours.

2. Refunds for any reason are not supported after shipment.

3. The account is sold and deleted, and the buyer protects the account security by himself, and we can't retrieve it if it is stolen!!

4. When you get the account, please be sure to change the password, mobile phone and email, and if you have the ability, you can bind the mobile phone token, and if you have any questions, you can directly query Baidu that there are answers and tutorials.

5. If you need a large quantity of wholesale, you can contact our online customer service, and the customer service will arrange someone to contact you to discuss the price in detail.
